text:
@FLOTUS @BritHos77 I love the entire Trump Team. 
New info I learned today. I think it was 2015 laws changed so research was awarded to the lab that had the virus leak. Here is the bombshell...Obama and dr. Faucci authorized 3.7 million dollars in research to none other than the human coronavirus
